add-lines.content:
"cs-check": "php-cs-fixer fix --dry-run --diff -v",
        "cs-fix": "php-cs-fixer fix",
        "rector-check": "rector process --dry-run",
        "rector-fix": "rector process",
        "phpstan": "phpstan clear-result-cache && phpstan analyse",
        "psalm": "psalm --clear-cache && psalm",
        "phpcs": "phpcs --no-cache",
        "phpcbf": "phpcbf -no-cache",
        "phpmd": "phpmd src text phpmd.xml",
        "check-all": [
            "@cs-check",
            "@rector-check",
            "@phpstan",
            "@psalm",
            "@phpcs",
            "@phpmd"
        ],
        "fix-all": [
            "@cs-fix",
            "@rector-fix",
            "@phpcbf"
        ],
